Update Notes
=============

This release adds support for the following DLCs

- Resident Evil: Revelations Parker's  Government  Handgun    Custom  Part
"FBC

Downloadable content that includes a weapon plus one custom part

Based on the powerful Government handgun, but given a stylish design  made
especially for Parker. Its ammo capacity has been sacrificed in  order  to
add  more  power,  due  to  Parker's  reputation   for   high   precision

- Resident Evil: Revelations Jill's Samurai Edge  Custom Part: "S.T.A.R.S

Downloadable content that includes a weapon plus one custom part

This handgun was originally based on the custom M92F "Samurai  Edge"  that
Jill used during her time in S.T.A.R.S., but it has since been changed  to
the M9A1 and refined to match modern tastes

- Resident Evil: Revelations Jessica's G18  Custom Part: "BSAA

Downloadable content that includes a weapon plus one custom part

It may look plain, but Jessica  feels  that  her  weapons  shouldn't  look
better than she does. It has a tan frame with the FBC seal carved into the
polymer slide

Instructions
=============

This release requires the following updates installed before you begin

ResidentEvilRevelationsUpdate1-FLTDOX
ResidentEvilRevelationsDLCPack-FLTDOX
ResidentEvilRevelationsDLCPack2-FLTDOX

Now unrar the update.exe and run it ( point to your installation
folder if required

Play the game
